ANTIPHOLUS
               
              OF
               
              EPHESUS
text:
Give
               
              her
               
              this
               
              key
              ,
               
              and
               
              tell
               
              her
               
              in
               
              the
               
              desk

speaker:
ANTIPHOLUS
               
              OF
               
              EPHESUS
text:
That’s
               
              covered
               
              o’er
               
              with
               
              Turkish
               
              tapestry

speaker:
ANTIPHOLUS
               
              OF
               
              EPHESUS
text:
There
               
              is
               
              a
               
              purse
               
              of
               
              ducats
              .
               
              Let
               
              her
               
              send
               
              it
              .

speaker:
ANTIPHOLUS
               
              OF
               
              EPHESUS
text:
Tell
               
              her
               
              I
               
              am
               
              arrested
               
              in
               
              the
               
              street
              ,

speaker:
ANTIPHOLUS
               
              OF
               
              EPHESUS
text:
And
               
              that
               
              shall
               
              bail
               
              me
              .
               
              Hie
               
              thee
              ,
               
              slave
              .
               
              Begone
              .
              —

speaker:
ANTIPHOLUS
               
              OF
               
              EPHESUS
text:
On
              ,
               
              officer
              ,
               
              to
               
              prison
               
              till
               
              it
               
              come
              .

speaker:
DROMIO
               
              OF
               
              SYRACUSE
text:
To
               
              Adriana
              .
               
              That
               
              is
               
              where
               
              we
               
              dined
              ,

speaker:
DROMIO
               
              OF
               
              SYRACUSE
text:
Where
               
              Dowsabel
               
              did
               
              claim
               
              me
               
              for
               
              her
               
              husband
              .

speaker:
DROMIO
               
              OF
               
              SYRACUSE
text:
She
               
              is
               
              too
               
              big
              ,
               
              I
               
              hope
              ,
               
              for
               
              me
               
              to
               
              compass
              .

speaker:
DROMIO
               
              OF
               
              SYRACUSE
text:
Thither
               
              I
               
              must
              ,
               
              although
               
              against
               
              my
               
              will
              ,

speaker:
DROMIO
               
              OF
               
              SYRACUSE
text:
For
               
              servants
               
              must
               
              their
               
              masters’
               
              minds
               
              fulfill
              .
